this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->

@alanfreed thanks for your contribution!  Did you see [`Unitful.jl`](https://github.com/PainterQubits/Unitful.jl) already?

[noblock]

No, I was not aware of Unitful.jl.  Thank you for bringing this amazing
package to my attention.  This certainly gives me things to think about.

Alan Freed,

body:
- Registering package: PhysicalSystemsOfUnits
- Repository: https://github.com/AlanFreed/PhysicalSystemsOfUnits.jl
- Created by: @AlanFreed
- Version: v0.1.0
- Commit: 053f7a36b75dccb30ba7e83cbf30c7f9e2c31a3b
- Git reference: HEAD
- Description: Types for describing the physical system of units that associate with a physical field, like force.
title: New package: PhysicalSystemsOfUnits v0.1.0
